A1

Affiliation

Published

March 3, 2023

Instructions

  1. Each Question in this Assignment is a chart.

  2. Each Chart is accompanied by a set of short questions.

  3. Your responses to these can be R-code, or text.

  4. Please number your answers as 1.a, 1.b, 1.c…..2.a, 2.b…on your Answer Sheet.

  5. All aboard? Let’s go!

Question 1

  1. List the variables are used in this graph?
  2. Identify their types. (Quantitative, Qualitative)

Question 1

  1. What is the ggplot geometry used in this graph?
  2. What do the colours mean?
